name: UnconventionalAdvice
0:
”Alexa, open Unconventional Advice”
”Alexa, ask Unconventional Advice for some advice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unconventional advice
des:
Are you tired of hearing the same clichéd advice? Does common sense do nothing for you? Do you want to improve yourself, your outlook, or your direction in life? Then this skill is for you! 

We have compiled a large variety of unconventional quotes, advice, and wisdom from various sources and filtered them down to offer the best advice you never hear. 

Simply say, "Alexa, open unconventional advice" or "Alexa, ask unconventional advice for advice" and hear some life-changing advice. Say, "Again" or "Give me advice" to keep hearing more unconventional advice.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
